pullRequest.title: Retire: Change "info" to proper references & change otherinfo handling
pullRequest.bodyText:
Prepare next dev iteration.
Repo, Result, RetireScanRule, RetireScanRuleUnitTest: Changes to accommodate new behavior. Per alert (result) CVEs and info/references are collected/used as a Set.
testrepository.json: Update so that one of the libraries has vulns with overlapping (non-unique) CVE and info (ref) details.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com

commit.message:
Retire: Change "info" to proper references & change otherinfo handling

- Prepare next dev iteration.
- Repo, Result, RetireScanRule, RetireScanRuleUnitTest: Changes to
accommodate new behavior. Per alert (result) CVEs and info/references
are collected/used as a Set.
- testrepository.json: Update so that one of the libraries has vulns
with overlapping (non-unique) CVE and info (ref) details.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
